nor.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: used after a negative statement in order to introduce another negative statement containing a similar kind of information
nor.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: I don’t expect children to be rude, nor do I expect to be disobeyed.
It was not my fault, nor his.
nor.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: used after a negative statement to say that the negative statement is also true for someone or something else
nor.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: ‘I don’t want to go.’ ‘Nor do I.’
They couldn’t understand it at the time, and nor could we.
